CatDescriptText: Sala Udin Saif Salaam (Sam Howze), coordinator of Ile Elegba, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Out column published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 3, 1970, pg. 4 with question: "What do you think of County Commissioners Staisey and Forester's recent appointment of Jim Slusser as Director of the Police Academy?" Answer reads: "From their perspective they couldn't get a better man.  From the perspective of the black community you couldn't get a worse man.  I'm sure he's capable of training and producing the kind of Gestapo troops that are his image and the image of those troops he called in during the rebellion."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Sala Udin (Sam Howze) wearing Anhk necklace and kufi, standing near doorway, Hill District
